ca.title: About - AnalyticsZone - Privacy-First Sports Analytics Applications
ca.description: Professional sports analytics applications for running, swimming, cycling, and walking. Privacy-first, scientifically-backed tools for athletes and coaches to track performance, analyze training data, and optimize athletic progression.
ca.content: {# Contingut Pàgina Qui Som - Català #} Qui Som Som un equip dedicat a crear llocs web professionals, accessibles i eficients. El nostre enfocament se centra en tres principis bàsics: rendiment , accessibilitat i mantenibilitat . Creiem que els grans llocs web han de ser ràpids, utilitzables per tothom i fàcils d'actualitzar. Cada projecte comença entenent les vostres necessitats i objectius. en.title: About AnalyticsZone | Professional Sports Analytics Applications
en.description: Learn about AnalyticsZone's mission to provide privacy-first, scientifically-backed sports analytics applications for athletes. Discover our commitment to data privacy and athletic excellence.
en.content: About AnalyticsZone Privacy-first sports analytics applications for athletes who value data ownership Our Mission AnalyticsZone exists to empower athletes with professional-grade analytics tools while respecting their fundamental right to data privacy. In an era where most fitness platforms require cloud accounts, collect user data, and monetize personal information, we take a different approach. Our applications process all data locally on your device—no servers, no tracking, no compromises. We

en.content: {# Privacy Policy - English #} Privacy Policy Last updated: January 2024 Introduction This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit our website. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled in a safe and responsible manner. Information We Collect Information you provide directly: Contact information (name, email) when you use our contact form Any other information you choose to provide

en.title: Privacy-First Technology - AnalyticsZone | Local Data Processing
en.description: Discover our privacy-first approach to sports analytics. All data processing happens locally on your device—no cloud storage, no tracking, complete data ownership for athletes.
en.content: {{ ui.technology.title }} {{ ui.technology.subtitle }} Privacy-First Architecture {{ ui.technology.local_processing }} Unlike traditional cloud-based analytics platforms, AnalyticsZone applications process all your training data locally on your device. This means: Your workout data never leaves your device No user accounts or registration required No third-party data sharing or selling Works completely offline after initial download You maintain complete ownership of your data 100% Local Process
